case_title: Atta Ullah Jogezai vs Chief Secretary Government of Balochistan Quetta and others
respondant: Chief Secretary Government of Balochistan Quetta

accussed_details.name: Respondent No. 5
allegation: Junior officer posted against senior post

complaint_summary: Appellant challenged the transfer from Managing Director GIEDA to Secretary Labour and Manpower Department, alleging the notification was illegal and issued without exigency of service.
investigation_summary: Appellant filed departmental appeal on 03-04-2023, which was unattended, leading to filing of service appeal on 03-05-2023. Interim relief was granted on 04-05-2023 but later recalled.
judgment_summary: The Tribunal dismissed the appeal, citing completion of appellant's tenure and violation of eligibility criteria for the post of Managing Director GIEDA (BPS-20). Both appellant and Respondent No. 5 were deemed ineligible for the position.
legal_arguments: Appellant argued Respondent No. 5 was a junior officer and the notification was issued improperly.
Defense argued transfer/posting is within the government's domain and appellant's claim lacks legal basis.
assets: Movable and immovable assets of Managing Director to be declared as per GIEDA Act.
statutes: Gwadar Industrial Estates Development Authority Act, 2009
sections: Section 4 of Balochistan Service Tribunal Act, 1974
Section 10 of Balochistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974
Section 6 of Gwadar Industrial Estates Development Authority Act, 2009
key_issues: Eligibility for Managing Director GIEDA post

maxims.Article 189 of Constitution of Pakistan: Law declared by Supreme Court is binding on all courts and government functionaries.

legal_terms.Civil Servant: A government employee subject to transfer/posting rules.
legal_terms.Exigency of Service: Requirement for transfer/posting in public interest.

words_and_phrases.Junior Officer: An officer holding a lower grade than the post assigned.
words_and_phrases.Interim Relief: Temporary relief granted during the pendency of a case.

summary_vector_notes: Appellant challenged transfer from Managing Director GIEDA citing illegality and procedural flaws. Tribunal dismissed appeal, citing tenure completion and ineligibility for the post. Both appellant and Respondent No. 5 deemed unsuitable for BPS-20 position.
